Welcome to Notification Diary!
 
This application is made for research purposes, and functions as a tool to reduce the amount of unwanted notifications on your smartphone.
 
The application asks you to specify the importance of INFORMATION show in notifications. It also analyses the SITUATION in which the notifications are presented to you.
 
Based on this information, it can hide unimportant notifications from you.
 
For the duration of Notification Diary use, please consider allowing all applications to send notifications and clear any personal notification settings.
 
Click next to continue the tutorial.
